verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> in a vision, <S%H4236><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> Abram: <S%H87><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am thy shield, <S%H4043><s%> and thy exceeding <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7235><s%> reward. <S%H7939><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> wilt thou give <S%H5414><s%> me, seeing I <S%H595><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> childless, <S%H6185><s%> and the steward <S%H1121><s%> <S%H4943><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> is this <S%H1931><s%> Eliezer <S%H461><s%> of Damascus? <S%H1834><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> to me thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> seed: <S%H2233><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> one born <S%H1121><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> is mine heir. <S%H3423><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be thine heir; <S%H3423><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> he that <S%H834><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of thine own bowels <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4578><s%> shall be thine heir. <S%H3423><s%>

And he brought him forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Look <S%H5027><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> toward heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and tell <S%H5608><s%> the stars, <S%H3556><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou be able <S%H3201><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> them: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, So <S%H3541><s%> shall thy seed <S%H2233><s%> be. <S%H1961><s%>
And he believed <S%H539><s%> in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and he counted <S%H2803><s%> it to him for righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> thee out of Ur <S%H4480><s%> <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to inherit <S%H3423><s%> it.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> whereby <S%H4100><s%> shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> it?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Take <S%H3947><s%> me an heifer <S%H5697><s%> of three years old, <S%H8027><s%> and a she goat <S%H5795><s%> of three years old, <S%H8027><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> of three years old, <S%H8027><s%> and a turtledove, <S%H8449><s%> and a young pigeon. <S%H1469><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> unto him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these, <S%H428><s%> and divided <S%H1334><s%> them in the midst, <S%H8432><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> each <S%H376><s%> piece <S%H1335><s%> one against <S%H7125><s%> another: <S%H7453><s%> but the birds <S%H6833><s%> divided <S%H1334><s%> he not. <S%H3808><s%>
And when the fowls <S%H5861><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the carcasses, <S%H6297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> drove them away. <S%H5380><s%> <S%H853><s%>

And when the sun <S%H8121><s%> was going down, <S%H935><s%> a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Abram; <S%H87><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> a horror <S%H367><s%> of great <S%H1419><s%> darkness <S%H2825><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram, <S%H87><s%> Know of a surety <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not <S%H3808><s%> theirs, and shall serve <S%H5647><s%> them; and they shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> them four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> that nation, <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they shall serve, <S%H5647><s%> will I <S%H595><s%> judge: <S%H1777><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall they come out <S%H3318><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> substance. <S%H7399><s%>
And thou <S%H859><s%> shalt go <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thy fathers <S%H1><s%> in peace; <S%H7965><s%> thou shalt be buried <S%H6912><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age. <S%H7872><s%>

But in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> they shall come hither again: <S%H7725><s%> <S%H2008><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%> full. <S%H8003><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that, when the sun <S%H8121><s%> went down, <S%H935><s%> and it was <S%H1961><s%> dark, <S%H5939><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> a smoking <S%H6227><s%> furnace, <S%H8574><s%> and a burning <S%H784><s%> lamp <S%H3940><s%> that <S%H834><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> those <S%H428><s%> pieces. <S%H1506><s%>

In the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> <S%H853><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> from the river <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5104><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The Kenites, <S%H7017><s%> and the Kenizzites, <S%H7074><s%> and the Kadmonites, <S%H6935><s%>
And the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Rephaims, <S%H7497><s%>
And the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> and the Jebusites. <S%H2983><s%>
